item.title: EdTech Orlando Meetup: Building a Community of Innovation
item.description: EdTech is a growing area of business and educational focus in Central Florida. The first EdTech Orlando Meetup was organized by Gregg Pollack at Envy Labs/Code School in Downtown Orlando on March 27. Gregg talked about the future of online education to a crowd of educators, edtech entrepreneurs, and other interested in this field. The key [...]
